steps.intention: Determine the time word based on the clock diagram.
steps.note: Use the learned skill 'interpret_clock_diagram' to interpret the position of the clock hands and determine the time word that fits the sentence 'It is (_) after eight.'

steps.intention: Call the learned skill to interpret the clock diagram.
Map the interpreted time word to the correct option label.
steps.note: The interpreted time word should be mapped to one of the options: (A) half, (B) quarter, (C) o'clock, (D) quarter to, (E) quarter past.

steps.intention: Normalize the answer to the required format.
